timeline.bodyText: I don't understand this, could you provide an example in the JavaDoc
timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.bodyText: ? I don't think this is the same - needs regression cover either way.
timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.bodyText:
shouldn't this be "name"?
Regardless, I feel this method is more complex than the previous code, and would be better reverted.
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText:
did you see the remaining of the changes of the last commit ?  Because the remaining seems nicer to me.
Of course, the comment may need to be more clear
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

replies.bodyText:
I initially thought about doing it simply with
getStringList(String key)
to get the list of values (assumed to be string) of those objects. And then I realized that it only uses "name", so I removed the argument
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

replies.bodyText: I'd be happier with getStringList(String key), but I (slightly) think it's over-abstracted in general
replies.author: david-allison-1
